name: [X-ED OUT]
description:
Defend our home from the assault of aliens. Use your 10 seconds of breathing time wisely to reap your rewards and prepare for even deadlier wave. Bundled with an evolving soundtrack and some outlandish special effects!

How to play

Use WASD. Yes, that is all you need to know. Even an alien from another galaxy could play this game.

Remember to full screen the game!
